title: BACKYARD / SMOKER ON THE BALCONY barks balcony

dialogueTree.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Hey, what's that noise down there?""
dialogueTree.polish: „Hej, co to za hałas tam na dole?”
dialogueTree.belarusian: «Гэй, што гэта за шум там унізе?»

dialogueTree.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""It's been a week and now they show..."
dialogueTree.english: "It's been a week and now they show up?"
dialogueTree.polish: „Minął tydzień i dopiero teraz się pojawiają?”
dialogueTree.belarusian: «Мінуў тыдзень, і толькі цяпер яны з'яўляюцца?»

dialogueTree.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""I can't get involved in this...""
Smoker on the Balcony: ""So much for a quiet smoke.""
Smoker on the Balcony: ""I *knew* I should've quit...""
